name: Carl and Neil Share a Dream
name_original: Carl and Neil Share a Dream
description:
As a  Ph.D. graduate in the 1970s, you begin a career in radio astronomy, hoping to explore the universe.  Ultimately, you may contact other thinking beings.

This puzzle-lite, choice-driven interactive fiction is easily played in a short session with multiple endings.   Inspired by the work of many scientific thinkers, most of all Carl Sagan, Robert Drake, and Neil DeGrasse Tyson.

Developed for My First Game Jam in July 2017.
